channel.title: I think someone damaged my port?
channel.description:
I had my server up for about a week, and started to work on another source, and while i was away, i came back i noticed that the server i was currently hosting had a error on the run.bat and this comes up every little while... Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:9946) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:380) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:372) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:259) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (bas2-london14-1167881631.dsl.bell.ca) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8586) at client.run(client.java:17310) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Naturally, i tried restarting the server, and once again it started doing the same thing. I even tried a different source on the same port, and now that source did the same error. But when i run the server on a different port so far i have not gotten that error. I would like help on knowing what the problem or error is if anyone knows!
Also i found that this was wierd, whenever i restarted my server after awhile, some people try to connect, although i didnt have that many people on my server, i am able to log in because im the hoster, but when i log on i see a person and then they disconnect

item.title: I think someone damaged my port?
item.dc:creator: @gmoney455 gmoney455
item.description:
@gmoney455 wrote:

yes fortunately, my router port was corrupt disconnecting anyone who tried to log into my server on that port, i ran a check on my router and fixed the problem.

Read full topic
item.source: I think someone damaged my port?

item.title: I think someone damaged my port?
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

Is your error fixed?

item.title: I think someone damaged my port?
item.dc:creator: @gmoney455 gmoney455
item.description:
@gmoney455 wrote:

skepskep:

[quote]I think someone damaged my port?

Moparscape has the most awesome quotes.[/quote]

How is that funny… So, maybe i worded my problem wrong, i was at first thinking in line of a ddos to my router through this port, but that would probably disabled my internet totally, so Call it what you want my port wasnt working.

And if your going to be in the “server Help” section", why don’t you actually give advice or find help instead of making random posts.

Read full topic
